content: Talk to your pieces, ask them where they would like to go, whether they would like to leave the board or even self-sacrifice for the greater good.
translations: ita:Parla con i tuoi pezzi, chiedi loro dove vorrebbero andare, se vorrebbero lasciare la scacchiera o addirittura sacrifica
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
